title.rendered: JOB POST: DevOps Technology Educator at Accenture, Hyderabad: Apply Now!

content.rendered:
Applications are invited for DevOps Technology Educator at Accenture, Hyderabad. Check the relevant details below!

About Accenture

Accenture is a global services company with expertise in digital, cloud and security. Combining unmatched experience and expertise in more than 40 industries, we offer Ideas & Services, Technology & Operations Services and Accenture Song, all deployed in the world’s largest network of technology and smart offices.

Job Description

  • Instrumental in keeping the technology talent market relevant, by upskilling and cross-skilling them.
  • Primarily responsible for delivering foundational training in technology, delivery, professional development and industry content.
  • Contribute to course content development and creation of questions for certification and assessments.

Responsibilities

  • Train employees on various DevOps Principals, Practices and DevOps tools.
  • Design, Develop, and Review DevOps training content and assessment creation through training need analysis
  • Open to learning new skills DevOps in another Technology and excel to conduct training in these areas.
  • Innovate and collaborate along with another team member.

Qualifications and Experience

Professional BE/BTech/MCA or equivalent Experience of 2-4 years.

Required Technical Expertise

Good knowledge of DevOps principles and practices, DevOps tools like Configuration management, Ansible, Container and Container Orchestration, Kubernetes on Cloud platforms, Azure and AWS etc

Location

Hyderabad, Telangana.

How to Apply?

Interested applicants can apply online through this link.

Click here to view the full notification DevOps Technology Educator at Accenture, Hyderabad.
